main_definition: Exterior refers to the outer surface or appearance of something, often used in architectural contexts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The outside part or surface of a building, structure, object, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The exterior of the house was painted white.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to what is visible from the outside; not internal
meanings_and_examples.example: His exterior demeanor masks his true feelings inside.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The outer appearance or impression of a person, which may be different from their inner qualities.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite her tough exterior, she is actually quite kind and compassionate.
